attributes.action: Enable junk mail to be returned to the sender
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Allow unwanted junk mail to be returned to the sender by reposting it back into a letter box. Legislation would be required enable allow the Post Office to charge the sender for the returned item.

This would -

1) reduce landfill
2) raise extra funds for the Post Office
3) make better use of paper resources
4) give a bigger role to the Post Office
5) force companies to make better and more focussed use of marketing material.Landfill
